title: Nova Gaming
body:
Hey all,

The ranked team Nova Gamin is currently looking for some substitutes for the team, we don't mind what position you play as it will be for when others aren't on. 

If interested please comment your:
-Summoner Name
-Rank
-Preferred Position(s)
-Age
-Favourite Champions

_Example:
Name: Casino Doyale
Rank: Silver 5
Preferred Position: Top
..... So on, so on...
_
